subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The Swiss rider Michael Albasini won the 13th stage of the Vuelta a España, while the British rider Bradley Wiggins held on to the overall leader’s red jersey for a third consecutive day.
snippet: The Swiss rider Michael Albasini won the 13th stage of the Vuelta a España, while the British rider Bradley Wiggins held on to the overall leader’s red jersey for a third consecutive day.
